Dialogue.Stage Direction: In the Dalek city, emissaries from the seven systems have gathered in the huge conference room. Representative Malpha is the last to take his seat.

Dialogue.Line: With the arrival of our ally Malpha, we are enough. The meeting can now begin.
No it can't.
What is wrong?
There is a hostile presence among us.
What do you mean?
On arrival here, I am told that there are hostile influences from the solar system among us.
Not among us.
Then here on the planet Kembel.
Some beings have landed from the planet Earth, hostile beings from the centre of the solar system. But do not worry. Their spaceship has been destroyed.
What about the beings?
They cannot escape. At this moment they are being hunted down. They will be destroyed.
Are you sure?
They cannot get away.
Suppose they send a message through this universe?
They will not have time. If they do not die by our Varga plants, my patrols will kill them! They will be exterminated! Exterminated!

metadata.title: The Gathering of the Emissaries
metadata.description: In the imposing conference room situated in the Dalek city, representatives from the seven systems convene for an important meeting. As Representative Malpha takes his seat, tension fills the air. The Dalek Supreme announces that the meeting can commence with the arrival of Malpha, but Malpha asserts that it cannot begin due to a perceived hostile presence. The Dalek Supreme is initially dismissive, declaring they need not worry as the intruders from the Solar System are being hunted down and will be exterminated. Malpha expresses concern over the possibility of a message being sent to warn others, to which the Dalek Supreme confidently asserts that they will not escape their fate of extermination.

events.title: Malpa Proclaims Hostile Presence
events.description: As the conference meeting begins with the arrival of Malpha, he immediately disrupts the proceedings by announcing that there is a hostile presence among them, raising concerns about intruders from the Solar System.
key_dialogue: With the arrival of our ally Malpha, we are enough. The meeting can now begin.
No it can't.
There is a hostile presence among us.

events.title: Dalek Supreme Assures Malpha
events.description: The Dalek Supreme responds to Malpha's claims by reassuring him that the hostile beings from Earth have been eliminated. It asserts that their spaceship was destroyed and that the beings cannot escape.
key_dialogue: What is wrong?
Not among us.
Some beings have landed from the planet Earth, hostile beings from the centre of the solar system. But do not worry. Their spaceship has been destroyed.

events.title: Malpha Questions Dalek Supreme
events.description: Malpha questions the Dalek Supreme about the beings that have landed and expresses concern over their potential to send a message through the universe.
key_dialogue: What about the beings?
They cannot escape. At this moment they are being hunted down. They will be destroyed.
Are you sure?

events.title: Dalek Supreme Guarantees Extermination
events.description: The Dalek Supreme reassures Malpha that the intruders will not be able to send any messages as they are currently being hunted and will be exterminated by their patrols and Varga plants.
key_dialogue: They cannot get away.
They will not have time. If they do not die by our Varga plants, my patrols will kill them! They will be exterminated! Exterminated!

agent_participations.current_status: Participating in the conference by expressing concern about intruders.
active_plans: To investigate the claims of a hostile presence.
beliefs: The situation could endanger their conference.
Trust in his own authority and status as a representative.
goals: To ensure the safety of the conference attendees.
To address and mitigate any threats to their alliance.

agent_participations.current_status: Present at the conference, initially trying to maintain order.
active_plans: Support the Dalek Supreme's authority.
Dissuade any panic among allies.
beliefs: He is influential and important in the conference.
The Daleks will provide safety and order.
goals: To strengthen his relationship with the Daleks.
To reassure allies of their safety and plans.

agent_participations.current_status: Expressing skepticism about the Dalek's claims.
active_plans: Question the credibility of the Dalek claims regarding the hostile beings.
beliefs: Not all actions of the Daleks are trustworthy.
Mavic Chen is acting in his own interests.
goals: Find out the truth about the supposed intruders.
Keep the conference united against a common threat.

agent_participations.current_status: Reassuring allies by stating the intruder’s defeat.
active_plans: Foster a sense of security among the allies.
beliefs: The Daleks are effectively eliminating threats.
His position makes him indispensable.
goals: To rally the allies around a single narrative of safety.
To manipulate the situation to keep his influence over the Daleks.

agent_participations.current_status: Pressing the Dalek Supreme for answers regarding the beings.
active_plans: Seek more information about the current situation.
beliefs: The Daleks may not have a full grip over the outcome.
Transparency is vital for alliance strength.
goals: Ensure that all allies are aware of potential threats.
Keep communication open with the Daleks.

agent_participations.current_status: Attempting to squelch Malpha's concerns.
active_plans: Calm Malpha's worries about the beings.
beliefs: His authority will reassure others.
He is clever enough to manipulate the situation.
goals: Maintain stability within the conference.
Prevent panic that could disrupt their plans.

agent_participations.current_status: Pressing for assurances from the Dalek Supreme.
active_plans: Determine the fate of the beings.
beliefs: The Daleks may not be acting in the best interest of their allies.
goals: To ensure that no further threats arise from the intruders.

agent_participations.current_status: Reassuring others of the Dalek’s control over the situation.
active_plans: Dissolve Malpha's fears about the intruders.
beliefs: The Daleks will handle the intruders adeptly.
goals: Maintain control of the narrative among the allies.
Keep his own power secure.

object_involvements.description_of_involvement: The Dalek Supreme opens the conference by acknowledging the arrival of Malpha and states that the meeting can now begin, demonstrating its authority over the proceedings.
object_involvements.object_status_before_event: The Dalek Supreme is operational and prepared to commence the meeting.
object_involvements.object_status_after_event: The Dalek Supreme is still operational, having set the stage for the meeting with Malpha present.

object_involvements.description_of_involvement: The Dalek Supreme reassures Malpha that the hostile beings from Earth have been destroyed and that the intruders cannot escape, affirming its role as a protector of the Dalek agenda.
object_involvements.object_status_before_event: The Dalek Supreme has just proclaimed the start of the meeting and is in command of the situation.
object_involvements.object_status_after_event: The Dalek Supreme maintains its robotic demeanor and authority, continuing its role in the ongoing conference.

object_involvements.description_of_involvement: The Dalek Supreme guarantees Malpha that the intruders will not be able to send messages and that they will be exterminated by Dalek patrols and Varga plants, reinforcing the Daleks' ruthless intent.
object_involvements.object_status_before_event: The Dalek Supreme is overseeing the meeting and monitoring the security of the perimeter.
object_involvements.object_status_after_event: The Dalek Supreme continues operational, its intent to hunt down and eliminate the intruders solidified.

object_involvements.description_of_involvement: The mention of Varga plants in the Dalek Supreme's speech implies the use of Varga thorns as a means of extermination, showcasing the Daleks' collaboratory tactics in dealing with threats.
object_involvements.object_status_before_event: The Varga thorns are part of the Varga plants in the vicinity, waiting passively for prey.
object_involvements.object_status_after_event: The Varga thorns remain ready for use in the active extermination of living entities near Kembel.

Dialogue.Stage Direction: Cory leads Lowery through the jungle, desperately seeking refuge.

Dialogue.Line: This way.

metadata.title: Desperate Refuge
metadata.description: In a dense and sprawling jungle, Cory anxiously leads Lowery through thick underbrush, their movements quick and stealthy as they seek a place to hide from impending danger. The sounds of unknown creatures echo through the foliage, adding to the urgency of their escape. The air is humid, filled with the scent of damp earth and vegetation, heightening the tension of their precarious situation.

events.title: Cory Leads Lowery Through the Jungle
events.description: Cory is leading Lowery through the dense jungle, searching for refuge from the danger that surrounds them. The urgency of their situation is evident as they navigate the treacherous terrain.
key_dialogue: CORY: This way.

agent_participations.current_status: Leading Lowery through the dense jungle.
active_plans: Find refuge in the jungle to evade danger.
beliefs: Survival requires immediate action.
goals: Ensure both he and Lowery find safety from the surrounding dangers.

agent_participations.current_status: Following Cory through the jungle.
active_plans: Stay close to Cory for guidance.
beliefs: Trust in Cory's leadership during the crisis.
goals: Survive the jungles of Kembel alongside Cory.

Dialogue.Stage Direction: The delegates signal their assent to the treaty laid before them.

Dialogue.Line: Agreed.
Agreed.
All are agreed. It is done. The seven great powers of the outer galaxies are one.
Our galactic domination. Victory.

Dialogue.Stage Direction: Malpha, assuming the role of speaker, addresses the others.

Dialogue.Line: This is indeed an historic moment in the history of the universe. We six from the outer galaxies, joining with the power from the solar system, the Daleks! The seven of us represent the greatest war force ever assembled. Conquest is assured! Mars! Venus! Jupiter! The moon colonies!
They will all fall before our might. But the first of them will be Earth!

metadata.title: The Conquest Pact
metadata.description: In a dimly lit conference room, delegates from various alien races gather to signal their approval of a galactic treaty. Alien 1 and Alien 2 express their agreement, followed by the Dalek Supreme confirming that all have assented to the treaty. Together, they proclaim their ambitions for domination, uniting the seven great powers of the outer galaxies under the leadership of the Daleks. Malpha stands and addresses the group, emphasizing the historical significance of their alliance and the power it brings. He lists the planets and colonies they intend to conquer, with the Dalek Supreme ominously stating that Earth will be the first target of their might.

events.title: Galactic Powers Agree to Treaty
events.description: The delegates in the conference room signal their agreement to the proposed treaty, indicating their support for galactic domination. The Dalek Supreme confirms that unity has been achieved among the seven great powers, marking a historic moment for their alliance. Malpha expresses pride in their combined strength and asserts their assured conquest of Mars, Venus, Jupiter, and the moon colonies, finally declaring that Earth will be the first target.
key_dialogue: Agreed.
All are agreed. It is done. The seven great powers of the outer galaxies are one.

This is indeed an historic moment in the history of the universe. We six from the outer galaxies, joining with the power from the solar system, the Daleks! The seven of us represent the greatest war force ever assembled. Conquest is assured! Mars! Venus! Jupiter! The moon colonies!
They will all fall before our might. But the first of them will be Earth!

agent_participations.current_status: Actively participating in the agreement process and presenting a hopeful vision for conquest.
agent_participations.emotional_state: Confident and ambitious, proud of the alliance's potential.
active_plans: To solidify the alliance of the seven great powers for conquest.
To place Earth as the first target in their plans for domination.
beliefs: Unity among powerful factions is essential for achieving galactic domination.
Earth is an obstacle to be eliminated for their conquest.
goals: To be recognized as a key leader in the new alliance.
To ensure the successful start of military actions against Earth.

agent_participations.current_status: Expressing personal grievances while supporting the treaty.
agent_participations.emotional_state: Frustrated but determined, feeling overshadowed by Chen's influence.
active_plans: To assert his galaxy's interests within the alliance.
To keep an eye on Chen and investigate his true intentions.
beliefs: The individual interests of each power should be maintained for mutual benefit.
Mavic Chen is not to be fully trusted, as he may have personal motives.
goals: To ensure that his galaxy's voices are not undermined by Chen and the Daleks.
To secure a position of influence within the new regime.

agent_participations.current_status: Facilitating the declaration of unity among the factions.
active_plans: To confirm the Daleks' dominant position in the new galactic order.
To prepare for future conflict, specifically targeting Earth.
beliefs: The Daleks are the superior race destined to rule the universe.
All lesser beings must be subjugated or exterminated to achieve dominance.
goals: To ensure that the Daleks' plans for conquest are put into motion.
To eliminate Earth as the first step in establishing Dalek supremacy over other powers.

object_involvements.description_of_involvement: The Dalek Supreme confirms the agreement of the galactic powers to the proposed treaty, marking a significant moment in their alliance for domination and asserting that Earth will be the first target of conquest.
object_involvements.object_status_before_event: The Dalek Supreme was with the other delegates, preparing for the treaty agreement.
object_involvements.object_status_after_event: The Dalek Supreme remains a central figure in the galactic alliance, poised to lead the Daleks in their planned conquest.

object_involvements.description_of_involvement: The great alliance of the seven powers is formed as the delegates signal their assent to the treaty, uniting their strengths for the coming conflict against Earth.
object_involvements.object_status_before_event: The concept of a united alliance among the seven great powers was still nascent, with tentative discussions underway.
object_involvements.object_status_after_event: The alliance becomes a formal entity, ready to execute plans for galactic domination, with Earth marked as their initial target.

Dialogue.Stage Direction: Resting as Cory scouts ahead, Lowery is now in great pain, and still desperately trying to suck the poison from his palm. Then he notices the back of his hand. Horrified, Lowery pulls up his sleeve to discover that his hand and forearm are covered with the white spines of the Varga. Hearing Cory returning, Lowery hastily covers his arm.

Dialogue.Line: We've got to get this capsule off, and fast. There's a city down there, A Dalek city. I got quite close. Close enough to hear an announcement through the loudspeaker system.
What did you hear?
Our whole galaxy is to be invaded and destroyed.
Kill.
What?
Kill. Kill.

Dialogue.Stage Direction: The truth dawns on Cory.

Dialogue.Line: The Varga!
That's right. I'll soon, soon I shall be one of them. Kill. Kill,

Dialogue.Stage Direction: Lowery brings his gun up, but Cory is quicker. Lowery slumps to the ground, dead. Businesslike, Cory turns his attention to the rescue beacon, and begins recording his message.

Dialogue.Line: Marc Cory, Special Security Service, reporting from the planet Kembel. The Daleks are planning the complete destruction of our galaxy. Together with the powers of the outer galaxies, a war force is being assembled.

Dialogue.Stage Direction: Elsewhere in the jungle

Dialogue.Line: Seismic detector is registering.
The crew from the rocket ship must be in this direction.
Are they to be taken for questioning?
No. They are to be exterminated. Destroy them on sight. Destroy and exterminate!
We obey.

Dialogue.Stage Direction: Unaware the Daleks are closing in on his position, Cory continues his recording.

Dialogue.Line: If our galaxy is to be saved, whoever receives this message must relay this information to Earth immediately. It is vital that defence mechanisms are put into operation at once! Message ends.

Dialogue.Stage Direction: Surrounded by Daleks, Cory struggles to launch the capsule.

Dialogue.Line: Fire. He is dead.
Our plans for the galactic conquest are safe. Whatever information he discovered has died with him. Return to the city.
We obey.

Dialogue.Stage Direction: As the Daleks move away, the capsule containing Cory's warning message lies unnoticed near his body.

metadata.title: Descent into Madness
metadata.description: In the thick jungle of Kembel, Marc Cory scouts ahead while Lowery struggles with intense pain, desperately attempting to suck the poison from his palm. His horror grows as he discovers his forearm covered with the white spines of the Varga. As Cory returns, he informs Lowery of a Dalek city nearby, from which he overheard plans for galactic destruction. Overwhelmed by the effects of the Varga poison, Lowery succumbs to madness, repeatedly chanting 'Kill.' Cory reacts swiftly, shooting Lowery to protect himself and then begins recording a desperate warning about the impending Dalek invasion aimed at the galaxy. Meanwhile, two Daleks analyze seismic readings in the jungle, noting the presence of the crew from the rocket ship and concluding that they must be exterminated. Unbeknownst to Cory, the Daleks are closing in. As he continues his recording, the Daleks later confirm that he is dead, ensuring that whatever information he discovered perishes with him. The scene ends with the capsule containing Cory's warning message lying unnoticed beside his lifeless body.

events.title: Cory Reveals Dalek Invasion Plans
events.description: Cory informs Lowery about the imminent Dalek invasion and destruction of their galaxy, revealing the dangerous implications of their situation.
key_dialogue: We've got to get this capsule off, and fast. There's a city down there, A Dalek city. I got quite close. Close enough to hear an announcement through the loudspeaker system.
What did you hear?
Our whole galaxy is to be invaded and destroyed.

events.title: Lowery Succumbs to Varga Influence
events.description: Lowery succumbs to the influence of the Varga poison, expressing a desire to kill and bringing up his gun in a moment of desperation.
key_dialogue: Kill.
That's right. I'll soon, soon I shall be one of them. Kill. Kill.

events.title: Cory Records Final Message
events.description: Cory records a vital message on the rescue beacon, warning of the Daleks' plans for galactic destruction and urging immediate relay to Earth.
key_dialogue: Marc Cory, Special Security Service, reporting from the planet Kembel. The Daleks are planning the complete destruction of our galaxy. Together with the powers of the outer galaxies, a war force is being assembled.
If our galaxy is to be saved, whoever receives this message must relay this information to Earth immediately. It is vital that defence mechanisms are put into operation at once! Message ends.

events.title: Daleks Confirm Cory's Death
events.description: Daleks express satisfaction over Cory's death, believing that the plans for galactic conquest are safe now that he has revealed nothing to Earth.
key_dialogue: He is dead.
Our plans for the galactic conquest are safe. Whatever information he discovered has died with him. Return to the city.

agent_participations.current_status: Informs Lowery about the impending Dalek invasion plans.
active_plans: Get the warning out to Earth using the rescue beacon.
beliefs: It is imperative to warn Earth of the Dalek threat.
goals: Prevent the Dalek invasion.
Relay vital information to Earth.

agent_participations.current_status: Asks Cory what he heard about the Dalek plans.
Succumbs to Varga influence and expresses a desire to kill.
active_plans: Bring up his gun with the intention to kill.
beliefs: He believes he will soon become a Varga.
goals: Embrace the Varga influence.

agent_participations.current_status: Records a final warning message on the rescue beacon.
active_plans: Outline the threat of Dalek destruction and urge for immediate action.
beliefs: His mission is vital for the survival of their galaxy.
goals: Get the message to Earth.

agent_participations.current_status: Expresses satisfaction over Cory's death.
active_plans: Ensure nothing of Cory's information about the Dalek plans survives.
beliefs: The Daleks will prevail in their plans for galactic conquest.
goals: Delete all threats to the Dalek operations.

object_involvements.description_of_involvement: Cory uses the rescue beacon to record a vital message warning about the imminent Dalek invasion and destruction of the galaxy. He ensures it contains imperative instructions for immediate relay to Earth.
object_involvements.object_status_before_event: Inactive, sitting unused while Cory and Lowery discuss the situation.
object_involvements.object_status_after_event: Activated, containing a recorded message warning of the Daleks' plans.

object_involvements.description_of_involvement: Lowery brings up his gun in an attempt to defend himself against the Varga influence, but is shot by Cory before he can do so.
object_involvements.object_status_before_event: Loaded and ready for use, in Lowery's possession.
object_involvements.object_status_after_event: Rendered useless when Lowery is dead after Cory shoots him.

Dialogue.Line: Now all is ready. We at this table pledge our allegiance to the Dalek cause. Our armies will reduce the galaxies to ashes. Their people to dust. And Earth we will conquer first. Victory! Victory!
Victory! Victory! Victory!

metadata.title: Pledge of Allegiance
metadata.description: In the conference room, a tense atmosphere fills the air as Malpha stands at the table, confidently proclaiming the readiness of the assembled allies to pledge their allegiance to the Daleks. His voice echoes with fervor as he speaks of their ambition to conquer Earth first and bring destruction to the galaxies. The gathered representatives, filled with a sense of unity and purpose, respond with chants of 'Victory!' that resonate through the room, emphasizing their commitment to the Dalek cause.

events.title: Malphas Declaration of Allegiance to the Dalek Cause
events.description: Malphas, representing the gathered leaders of the outer galaxies, declares that they are ready to pledge their allegiance to the Dalek cause. He enthusiastically proclaims that their armies will reduce galaxies to ashes and conquer Earth first. The other delegates echo Malphas's call in unison, chanting victory as they express their allegiance.
key_dialogue: Now all is ready. We at this table pledge our allegiance to the Dalek cause. Our armies will reduce the galaxies to ashes. Their people to dust. And Earth we will conquer first. Victory! Victory!
Victory! Victory! Victory!

agent_participations.current_status: Declaring allegiance to the Dalek cause with enthusiasm.
agent_participations.emotional_state: Eager and confident about the potential for conquest.
active_plans: To lead the forces of the outer galaxies in support of the Daleks.
To ensure the defeat of Earth as the first target.
beliefs: Believes in the strength and superiority of the Dalek forces.
Has faith that the outer galaxies will succeed under Dalek leadership.
goals: To secure a position of power among the Daleks.
To reduce galaxies to ashes and conquer Earth.

agent_participations.current_status: Echoing Malphas's declaration to the Dalek cause.
active_plans: To align with the Dalek cause in hopes of gaining power.
To ensure his own safety in the impending conquests.
beliefs: Believes that allegiance to the Daleks will ensure survival.
Trusts the Daleks' capabilities in conquering galaxies.
goals: To establish a foothold in the new order under the Daleks.
To avoid becoming a casualty of the Dalek's ambitions.

agent_participations.current_status: Commanding and overseeing the pledges of allegiance.
agent_participations.emotional_state: Indifferent, focused on the strategic advantage of the alliances.
active_plans: To ensure the loyalty of outer galaxy leaders to the Dalek cause.
To prepare for the imminent conquests.
beliefs: Believes in the superiority and inevitability of Dalek triumph.
Views allies as mere tools to be used for conquest.
goals: To secure the Taranium core and the support of outer galaxies.
To facilitate the first assault on Earth.

object_involvements.description_of_involvement: The Dalek cause is declared by Malphas, who represents the leaders of the outer galaxies. It is proclaimed that their allegiance to the Dalek cause will lead them to reduce galaxies to ashes, emphasizing the might and ambition of the Daleks.
object_involvements.object_status_before_event: The Dalek cause is a contextual concept representing the goals and ambitions of the Daleks, without a physical form.
object_involvements.object_status_after_event: The declaration solidifies the strength and unification of the outer galaxies' leaders under the Dalek cause, increasing its significance and narrative weight within the story.

agent-jeff_garvey.name: Jeff Garvey
agent-jeff_garvey.description: Jeff Garvey is portrayed as an agent who finds himself on the hostile planet Kembel. He is disoriented and in physical pain at the beginning of the scene but gradually becomes resolved to his violent intentions, expressing a singular focus on killing. His demeanor shifts from confusion and agony to a calm determination to kill, indicating a complex psychological state.

agent-marc_cory.name: Marc Cory
agent-marc_cory.title: Special Security Agent
agent-marc_cory.description: Marc Cory is portrayed as a determined and focused character, engaged in the perilous task of repairing a rocket ship on the hostile jungle planet of Kembel. He exhibits confidence in his abilities but is also faced with threats from other characters. His relationship with Gordon Lowery is tense, as he insists on his own priorities over Lowery's warnings. Cory's actions indicate a strong survival instinct, and he is not afraid to make difficult decisions under pressure.

agent-gordon_lowery.name: Gordon Lowery
agent-gordon_lowery.title: Captain
agent-gordon_lowery.description: Gordon Lowery is depicted as a practical and responsible captain. In this scene, he is struggling with the pain of a Varga infection in his hand, which adds to his tension and frustration. His complex character is underscored by a mixture of determination to accomplish their mission, mixed with vulnerability from his injuries. He has a strong bond with Cory, both of whom are undergoing a tense situation as the threat of the Varga takeover looms.

agent-mavic_chen.name: Mavic Chen
agent-mavic_chen.title: Guardian of the Solar System
agent-mavic_chen.description: Mavic Chen is a powerful politician and the Guardian of the Solar System, driven by a burning desire for power and control over the entire Universe. He is cunning, manipulative, and willing to make deals with the Daleks to achieve his goals, viewing others as pawns in his grand scheme. Chen is charismatic, able to charm those around him when it serves his goals, but his true nature is selfish and ruthless.

agent-trantis.name: Trantis
agent-trantis.description: Trantis is the representative of the largest outer galaxy, displaying a constant pursuit of power. He is prideful and often seems arrogant, yet possesses a degree of intelligence and cunning. His refusal to accept subordination leads him to continual conflict with allies like Mavic Chen.

agent-black_dalek.name: Black Dalek
agent-black_dalek.title: Dalek Supreme
agent-black_dalek.description: The Black Dalek serves as the supreme leader among the Daleks, orchestrating their plans and decisions regarding their conquests with ruthless efficiency. In this scene, it is focused on ensuring the success of their invasion, viewing other life forms as inferior. The Black Dalek interprets threats to its ambitions with a cold, logical mind, clearly prioritizing the recovery of the Taranium above all else.

object-gun.name: Gun
object-gun.description: A standard firearm carried by Jeff Garvey, capable of discharging lethal projectiles. The gun is likely a compact pistol suitable for close-quarters combat, designed to be easily accessible from a belt.
object-gun.purpose: To provide Garvey with the means to defend himself or attack others as he pursues his intent to kill.
object-gun.significance: Symbolizes Garvey's descent into violence and his psychological torment, as it reinforces his singular focus on the act of killing.

object-ray_gun.name: Ray Gun
object-ray_gun.description: A futuristic firearm capable of discharging a ray to incapacitate or kill targets. It is small enough to be held with one hand and is characterized by its sleek design, typical of advanced weaponry.
object-ray_gun.purpose: To incapacitate targets or defend against threats in hostile environments.
object-ray_gun.significance: Crucial for survival against dangerous threats, this weapon symbolizes the inherent violence and conflict the characters are embroiled in.

object-varga_thorn.name: Varga Thorn
object-varga_thorn.description: A sharp, dangerous thorn from the Varga plant, known for its venomous qualities. Lowery's arm is covered with them, indicating he is becoming infected.
object-varga_thorn.purpose: To incapacitate or kill creatures that come into contact with the Varga plants; in Lowery's case, it causes transformation into a Varga.
object-varga_thorn.significance: The presence of the Varga thorn on Lowery's body signifies his impending transformation and highlights the threat posed by the Daleks' biological weapons.

object-tarnium.name: Taranium Core
object-tarnium.description: A small but highly valuable core constructed from Taranium, it emits a faint glow and is essential for powering advanced weapons or machines such as the Time Destructor. It is a critical component for the Daleks' plans.
object-tarnium.purpose: To serve as a power source for the Time Destructor, which has the potential to cause widespread devastation.
object-tarnium.significance: Central to the overarching conflict, it represents the destructive capabilities of both the Daleks and their traitorous ally, Mavic Chen.

object-id_card.name: ID Card
object-id_card.description: A formal identification document indicating the holder's affiliation with the Space Security Service. It identifies Cory as an authorized member of the agency, suggesting the authority and trust endowed upon him.
object-id_card.purpose: To establish Cory's identity and authority as a Space Security Service agent.
object-id_card.significance: Symbolizes Cory's position and the responsibilities he bears, particularly in the context of the urgent situation regarding the Daleks.

object-dalek_suprm.name: Dalek Supreme
object-dalek_suprm.description: The Dalek Supreme is a high-ranking member of the Dalek hierarchy, tasked with overseeing major operations and decisions within the Dalek command structure. It possesses advanced strategic capabilities and is often present at significant meetings such as alliances and military operations.
object-dalek_suprm.purpose: To provide commands and directives to other Daleks, ensuring the execution of their plans and maintaining control over their operations.
object-dalek_suprm.significance: Embodies the power and authority of the Dalek race, symbolizing their ruthless and organized approach to domination and extermination of other beings.

object-dalek_1.name: Dalek
object-dalek_1.description: A robotic life-form encased in a formidable metallic shell equipped with advanced weaponry. Daleks are driven by a singular desire to exterminate non-Dalek life forms and possess a range of technological capabilities including energy projection and autonomous movement.
object-dalek_1.purpose: To carry out the orders given by the Dalek Supreme and other higher-ranking Daleks, primarily focusing on extermination of any aliens and threats to their plans.
object-dalek_1.significance: Represents the relentless nature of Dalek strategies and their singular focus on destruction. Their presence indicates the imminent threat to the protagonists.

object-dalek_2.name: Dalek Patrol
object-dalek_2.description: A group of Daleks operating as a security detail, tasked with hunting down any alien space craft and its crew. They are equipped with various weapons and rely on their orders for tactical decisions.
object-dalek_2.purpose: To execute tactical approaches to capture or destroy detected alien crafts, ensuring the security of Dalek operations.
object-dalek_2.significance: Highlights the Daleks' strategic capabilities and their organized response to perceived threats, further emphasizing the sense of danger in the narrative.

object-rescue_beacon.name: Rescue Beacon
object-rescue_beacon.description: A standard safety equipment used on rocket ships to transmit distress signals. It functions similarly to a tape recorder, where a message can be recorded and then launched high into orbit.
object-rescue_beacon.purpose: To send a warning message about the impending invasion by the Daleks and to request immediate assistance.
object-rescue_beacon.significance: Acts as the last hope for Cory and Lowery, symbolizing their struggle for survival against overwhelming odds, and their connection to any rescuers who might help them.

object-gearons_ship.name: Gearon's Ship
object-gearons_ship.description: The spaceship that has arrived from the planet Gearon. It is a representation of interstellar travel and serves as a means of transportation for its crew.
object-gearons_ship.purpose: To transport individuals or cargo from the planet Gearon to another location in space.
object-gearons_ship.significance: Represents the initiation of the Great Alliance, linking various powers in a unified force, potentially to contend against threats like the Daleks.

object-great_alliance.name: Great Alliance
object-great_alliance.description: A coalition of various alien armies and factions who pledge their allegiance to the Dalek cause, led by Malpha. This alliance signifies a collective intent to engage in war against Earth and other galaxies.
object-great_alliance.purpose: To unite forces in an effort to conquer and destroy other worlds, starting with Earth.
object-great_alliance.significance: Represents the culmination of the Daleks' manipulative influence over disparate forces, highlighting the threat they pose to the universe's peace and stability.

object-capsule.name: Capsule
object-capsule.description: A small, cylindrical container designed to hold and protect the distress signal message inside. Light enough to be portable and resilient enough to withstand the challenges of being launched into the atmosphere.
object-capsule.purpose: To record and transmit a distress signal indicating the current situation and whereabouts of the crew.
object-capsule.significance: Serves as a crucial means of communication to alert others about the peril posed by the Daleks, emphasizing the theme of hope amidst danger.

object-dalek_cause.name: Dalek Cause
object-dalek_cause.description: The cause refers to the overarching goal and ideology of the Daleks, which is centered around the conquest and extermination of other life forms, particularly targeting Earth as their first conquest.
object-dalek_cause.purpose: To unify various factions and non-Dalek forces in their mission to invade and dominate other galaxies.
object-dalek_cause.significance: Symbolizes the collective ambition and ruthless intent of the factions gathered, revealing their willingness to align with the Daleks for power and control.

object-varga_plants.name: Varga Plants
object-varga_plants.description: Varga Plants are carnivorous flora that thrive in the hostile environment of Kembel. They have the ability to capture and kill prey, often using their deceptive appearance to lure creatures close before attacking. Characterized by their toxic properties, exposure can lead to fatal consequences for other beings.
object-varga_plants.purpose: To act as a natural defense mechanism against intruders and an effective method of hunting prey.
object-varga_plants.significance: The mention of Varga plants underscores Kembel's dangerous ecosystem and the threats that face intruders, highlighting the environment's hostility.

object-malpha.name: Malpha
object-malpha.description: Malpha is a representative of one of the outer galaxies, participating in the Dalek conference. He is characterized by his ambition and desire for power, believing his contribution to the alliance will strengthen his standing among the galactic powers.
object-malpha.purpose: To represent his galaxy's interests and negotiate alliances with the Daleks.
object-malpha.significance: Represents the treacherous nature of alliances formed out of desperation, showcasing how less powerful factions can become pawns in more dangerous games.

location-jungle.name: Jungle
location-jungle.description: A dense, hostile jungle on the planet Kembel, filled with large trees, thick undergrowth, and lurking dangers. The environment is characterized by its tropical heat, pervasive humidity, and the ominous sounds of unseen creatures. The foliage is lush, but the jungle is also a menacing place where visibility is low and survival is precarious.

location-kembel_jungle.name: Kembel Jungle
location-kembel_jungle.description: The dense, hostile jungle of Kembel is filled with tall, twisted trees, thick underbrush, and ominous wildlife. The atmosphere is humid, and sounds of rustling leaves and distant animal cries permeate the air. It is a dangerous environment, full of carnivorous flora like the Varga plant, which poses a significant threat to those who traverse its depths. The area harbors secrets and dangers unseen, with the presence of Daleks looming nearby.

location-kembel_clearing.name: Forest Clearing
location-kembel_clearing.description: A small clearing in the dark, dense Kembel jungle where Jeff Garvey is lying on the ground, which allows for slight visibility and a brief refuge from the surrounding trees and verdant undergrowth.

location-outside_the_ship.name: Outside the ship
location-outside_the_ship.description: The outdoor area outside the rocket ship where Cory and Lowery are stationed. It is a desolate and hostile environment on the planet Kembel, characterized by thick jungle and a sense of foreboding as the Vargas creatures edge closer, posing an imminent threat.

location-mira.name: Mira
location-mira.description: A planet characterized by its dense jungle filled with carnivorous plants, such as the Varga. The atmosphere is humid and thick, creating an unsettling environment where dangerous creatures lurk. The area outside the rocket ship is filled with dense bushes, varied vegetation, and pockets of swampy ground. The remnants of a destroyed rocket ship lie nearby, smoke billowing from its wreckage, indicating the violence of a recent attack.

location-experimental_plant.name: Experimental Plant
location-experimental_plant.description: A facility designed for rocket research, featuring control rooms filled with advanced technology and systems. It is equipped for testing new rocket systems and providing shelter for the guards and scientists working on various projects.

location-spar.name: Spar
location-spar.description: The name given to a sleek, dark spaceship operated by Mavic Chen. It is equipped with advanced technology, luxurious interiors, and advanced weaponry systems, designed for travel and combat in space.

location-inside_the_ship.name: Inside the ship
location-inside_the_ship.description: The interior of the ship is compact and utilitarian, featuring various control panels and an area for communication. The environment is tense as two characters engage in a weighty conversation about survival. The atmosphere can be described as functional but burdened by the pressing concerns of the characters, with the constant risk of imminent danger from external threats.

location-space_freighter_xm2.name: Space Freighter XM2
location-space_freighter_xm2.description: A damaged space freighter where the scene unfolds. It is implied that the ship has some communication capability despite the current state of disrepair. The interior features a cockpit or control room, indicating functionality suited for flight operations.

location-varga_plant_growth_areas.name: Varga Plant Growth Areas
location-varga_plant_growth_areas.description: The external environment surrounding the ship is characterized by hostile conditions, indicative of the planet's dangerous atmosphere. Varga plants are mentioned as naturally growing in this region, contributing to the perilous nature of the locale.

location-dalek_control_room.name: Dalek control room
location-dalek_control_room.description: The main operational area for the Daleks, featuring various control panels and monitors to manage their technological systems and coordinate their activities. The room is characterized by its cold, metallic aesthetics, highlighted by the contrast of the Jet Black casing of the Dalek Supreme against the gunmetal blue-grey and silver of other Daleks present.

location-rocket_ship.name: Rocket Ship
location-rocket_ship.description: A small metal craft in distress, used for rescue missions. The ship's exterior shows signs of damage from a crash, with visible components like the capsule launcher and a framework for the rocket beacon. It serves as the focal point for the characters as they attempt to signal for help while fending off threats.

location-clearing.name: Clearing
location-clearing.description: An open area within the jungle where the rocket ship was previously located. This clearing provides a vantage point to the surrounding jungle. Its destruction caused by the Dalek's fire serves as a grim reminder of the immediate danger that the protagonists face.

location-conference_room.name: Conference room
location-conference_room.description: A large, imposing conference room located within the Dalek city, designed for gatherings of high-ranking officials from various systems. The room is equipped with advanced technology, including communication panels for interactions with emissaries. The atmosphere is tense, reflecting the high stakes of the meeting. The Dalek Supreme oversees the proceedings, emphasizing the authority of the Daleks.

location-dalek_city.name: Dalek City
location-dalek_city.description: The city is characterized by metallic structures and advanced technology, serving as a base for the Daleks. It is strategically hidden within the Kembel jungle, designed to facilitate their plans for galactic conquest. The atmosphere is tense with the presence of Daleks, constantly monitoring their surroundings for threats. Loudspeaker systems broadcast orders and announcements, indicating the military nature of the city.

location-kembel.name: Kembel
location-kembel.description: Kembel is characterized as the most hostile planet in the universe, with dangerous environmental conditions and a reputation that discourages visitors. It has dense jungles and is largely avoided by other civilizations, creating a sense of isolation and danger. The turmoil within these settings heightens the urgency of the characters' mission.

location-varga_clearing.name: Varga Clearing
location-varga_clearing.description: The vicinity surrounding the rocket ship where Cory and Lowery are stationed, under threat from approaching Vargas. The area is a clearing in the dense vegetation of Mira, bypassed by the swamp's murky waters yet still susceptible to the dangers lurking close by.

location-rocket_ship_clearing.name: Rocket Ship Clearing
location-rocket_ship_clearing.description: A small clearing in the dense jungle where the rocket ship was initially located. It is now marked by the destruction of the ship, with debris scattered about. The ground is scorched and ruined, indicative of the recent battle with the Daleks. The area has poor visibility due to the surrounding foliage.

org-varga.name: Varga
org-varga.description: The Varga are a type of carnivorous plant native to the hostile jungles of Kembel that possess the ability to infect living beings using poisoned thorns. In this scene, they are referenced as a potential threat to Cory and Lowery as they navigate the dangers of Kembel.

org-space_security_service.name: Space Security Service
org-space_security_service.description: A governmental organization responsible for the security and enforcement of laws in space operations, often engaging in missions to protect Earth and its interests from external threats.

org-daleks.name: Daleks
org-daleks.description: The Daleks are a race of mutant beings encased in armored travel machines, known for their relentless pursuit of supremacy and extermination of other life forms. They operate under a strict hierarchy and are characterized by their cold logic and ruthless approaches to achieving power and control over the Universe.
org-daleks.sphere_of_influence: Galactic domination and extermination of other species.

org-dalek_empire.name: Dalek Empire
org-dalek_empire.description: The Dalek Empire is a ruthless coalition of Daleks who seek to conquer and destroy the Universe, eliminating all inferior life forms. They operate with military precision and execute plans to achieve total domination, including the elimination of any threats.

org-dalek_security_patrol.name: Dalek Security Patrol
org-dalek_security_patrol.description: A tactical division of Daleks responsible for monitoring and securing specific areas, as well as executing tactical operations to neutralize threats.

org-special_security_service.name: Special Security Service (SSS)
org-special_security_service.description: The Special Security Service is a governmental organization tasked with maintaining security across the galaxy, investigating potential threats, and protecting vital interests, including that of the Earth and its colonies.

org-seven_systems.name: Seven Systems
org-seven_systems.description: The Seven Systems represent an alliance of various planets and their delegates, who gather to discuss and expand their interests against common threats, including the Daleks.

org-outer_galaxy_alliance.name: Outer Galaxy Alliance
org-outer_galaxy_alliance.description: A coalition of six powers from the outer galaxies joining forces with the Daleks to achieve galactic domination. This alliance represents a massive military force aimed at conquest.

org-dalek_alliance.name: Dalek Alliance
org-dalek_alliance.description: A coalition of various alien races and factions pledging their allegiance to the Daleks in pursuit of galactic conquest.

org-masters_of_celation.name: Masters of Celation
org-masters_of_celation.description: An alien faction joining forces with the Daleks to conquer Earth and the galaxy, contributing their armies to the Dalek cause.

org-beaus.name: Beaus
org-beaus.description: An outer galaxy civilization aligning with the Daleks to assist in their conquest of Earth and beyond.

org-outer_galaxies.name: Outer Galaxies Powers
org-outer_galaxies.description: A coalition of seven great powers from the outer galaxies, joining forces with the Daleks to ensure domination across the universe. The alliance represents a significant military threat.

org-galactic_human_alliance.name: Galactic Human Alliance
org-galactic_human_alliance.description: An alliance of various human factions across different planets, working together to address threats such as those posed by the Daleks and other hostile entities.

org-sss.name: Special Security Service
org-sss.description: The Special Security Service (SSS) is an Earth-based organization dedicated to maintaining security and intelligence across the Solar System. They engage in various missions to protect Earth from potential threats, exemplified by Marc Cory and Gordon Lowery's involvement in investigating the dangers posed by the Daleks.

org-seven_outer_systems.name: Seven Outer Systems
org-seven_outer_systems.description: A coalition of seven outer galaxies represented in a conference, seeking to align with the Daleks for mutual benefit and conquest of the Solar System.
